alert.note: Alert for Essex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:29PM EDT until June 16 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL RICHMOND AND SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX COUNTIES... At 729 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharps, or near Warsaw, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Richmond and southeastern Essex Counties, including the following locations... Wellford, Tidewater, Village, Kennard, Bowlers Wharf, Emmerton and Lyells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
